songs.title: Insecure
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Bravo]
You can tell that we’re all insecure
We’re lacking purpose but see all we got is time
Still don’t know just what I’m lookin for
I’m turning corners never knowing what’s behind
You could say I’m strung out in the moment
My grip is slipping can’t forget that were just victims of our dispositions
I can feel the liquor takin over
Drowning my conscience I can hear it screaming never get myself to listen

[Chorus: Bravo]
You won’t see that side of me no
I barely show it to myself
And I been runnin’ all on this mile long tight rope
Can’t bring myself to ask for help

[Verse 2: Lucien Parker]
Baby don’t ghost me
I’m too young to be drowning in your love like this
We’re too young to be giving it all up like this
And shorty dancing but these lights just not compared to you
I lose myself inside this life it’s just not fair to you
And I’m chasing my bag
Know you gon’ pop on my line when I’m back
He sent you off I don’t ever do that
And I, got a couple niggas that was really with the shits I
Got a couple niggas that was really doin’ biz

[Chorus: Bravo]
You won’t see that side of me no
I barely show it to myself
And I been runnin’ all on this mile long tight rope
Can’t bring myself to ask for help
